forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow will taper off and end this evening but skies will remain cloudy late. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow will taper off and end this evening but skies will remain cloudy late. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow showers developing after midnight. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers of rain and wet snow in the evening. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then remaining overcast late. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
